title: Encroachment upon your liberties quote - situation

content.prompt: Which of the following factors contributed most directly to the views expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: The limitations placed on the federal government by the Articles of Confederation
The efforts made to increase economic growth in the new nation
The desire to settle new territory controlled by American Indians

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
